mapper.select: select h_id, h_pid, h_name, h_status, h_deleted, h_url, h_target from h_menu where h_deleted = #{dele}
mapper.insert: insert into h_menu (h_id, h_pid, h_name, h_status, h_deleted, h_url, h_target) values (#{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hPid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update h_menu
h_pid = #{hPid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
h_name = #{hName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

h_url = #{hUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
h_target = #{hTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where h_id = #{hId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
